attributes.action: any immigrant that cannot abide by OUR laws should be automatically sent out of the country
attributes.additional_details: any person entering this country whether its for short stay or permanent residence should abide by our laws! if an immigrant breaks the law regardless of how big or small the crime they should automatically and immediatly made to leave the country. Immigrants who come here for perminent residence burn our poppys and disrespect our country yet nothing is done!! this country really needs to stand up and change its ways!!!
